title: Dubai City Explorer - 4 Days
description: Discover the modern marvels and traditional charm of Dubai in this comprehensive 4-day city tour. Experience iconic landmarks, luxury shopping, and authentic Emirati culture.

itinerary.title: Arrival & Modern Dubai
itinerary.description: Airport pickup, hotel check-in, Burj Khalifa visit, Dubai Mall exploration

itinerary.title: Traditional Dubai
itinerary.description: Dubai Creek, Gold Souk, Spice Souk, Al Fahidi Historical District

itinerary.title: Dubai Marina & Beaches
itinerary.description: Dubai Marina walk, JBR Beach, Marina cruise, Palm Jumeirah visit

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Last-minute shopping, airport transfer

title: Dubai Desert Adventure - 3 Days
description: Experience the thrill of the Arabian Desert with dune bashing, camel riding, and traditional Bedouin camp experiences. Perfect for adventure seekers.

itinerary.title: Desert Safari & Camp
itinerary.description: Pickup from Dubai, dune bashing, camel ride, desert camp setup, BBQ dinner

itinerary.title: Desert Activities
itinerary.description: Sunrise photography, sandboarding, falconry show, traditional breakfast

itinerary.title: Return to Dubai
itinerary.description: Morning desert walk, return to Dubai, city drop-off

title: Dubai Luxury Experience - 5 Days
description: Indulge in the ultimate Dubai luxury experience with 5-star accommodations, private tours, fine dining, and exclusive access to premium attractions.

itinerary.title: Luxury Arrival
itinerary.description: VIP airport pickup, 5-star hotel check-in, welcome dinner at Burj Al Arab

itinerary.title: Sky High Dubai
itinerary.description: Private helicopter tour, Burj Khalifa VIP experience, luxury shopping

itinerary.title: Atlantis Experience
itinerary.description: Atlantis Resort day pass, aquarium visit, water park access, spa treatment

itinerary.title: Private Yacht & Desert
itinerary.description: Private yacht charter, luxury desert safari with private camp

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Final shopping, VIP airport transfer

title: Mustang Flight & Drive Tour - 5 Days
description: Experience the mystical kingdom of Mustang with a perfect combination of flight and drive. Explore ancient monasteries, dramatic landscapes, and unique Tibetan culture in the rain shadow of the Himalayas.
highlights: Flight to Jomsom with mountain views

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Pokhara to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Early morning flight from Kathmandu to Pokhara, then scenic flight to Jomsom. Explore Jomsom bazaar and acclimatize to the altitude.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Charang to Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Drive through dramatic landscapes to Charang village. Visit Charang monastery and continue to Lo Manthang, the ancient walled capital.

itinerary.title: Explore Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Full day exploration of Lo Manthang. Visit Jampa Gompa, Thubchen Gompa, and Choprang Gompa. Experience local Tibetan culture.

itinerary.title: Lo Manthang to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Return journey to Jomsom via different route. Stop at Ghami village and see the longest mani wall in Nepal.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Pokhara to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Jomsom to Pokhara with stunning mountain views. Connect to Kathmandu flight or extend stay in Pokhara.

title: Rara Scenic Tour by Flight & Road - 7 Days
description: Discover Nepal's largest and most beautiful alpine lake in the remote far-western region. This unique tour combines scenic flights and overland journey to explore the pristine Rara National Park.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Kathmandu to Nepalgunj. Rest and prepare for mountain flight next day.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj to Talcha Airport, Drive to Rara Lake
itinerary.description: Early morning scenic flight to Talcha Airport. Drive to Rara Lake through beautiful countryside.

itinerary.title: Explore Rara Lake
itinerary.description: Full day exploration around Rara Lake. Boat ride on the pristine waters, nature walks around the lake.

itinerary.title: Rara Lake Exploration
itinerary.description: Continue exploring Rara National Park. Wildlife spotting, hiking to viewpoints, photography.

itinerary.title: Rara to Talcha, Fly to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Morning departure from Rara Lake area to Talcha Airport. Flight back to Nepalgunj.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Nepalgunj to Kathmandu. Free time for last-minute shopping or sightseeing.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Transfer to international airport for departure or extend your stay in Nepal.

title: Bardiya Wilderness Experience - 4 Days
description: Experience Nepal's best kept wildlife secret in Bardiya National Park. Enjoy thrilling jungle safaris, spot Royal Bengal tigers, one-horned rhinos, and diverse wildlife in their natural habitat.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Bardiya
itinerary.description: Arrive in Bardiya National Park area. Check into jungle lodge. Evening Tharu cultural program.

itinerary.title: Full Day Jungle Safari
itinerary.description: Early morning jeep safari in search of tigers and rhinos. Afternoon elephant safari. Evening boat safari on Karnali River.

itinerary.title: Wildlife Activities
itinerary.description: Morning bird watching and nature walk. Visit Tharu village. Afternoon jungle safari with different route.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Early morning final safari activity. Return to lodge for breakfast and checkout.

title: Chitwan Jungle Stay - 4 Days
description: Immerse yourself in the heart of Chitwan National Park with an authentic jungle stay experience. Encounter diverse wildlife including rhinos, tigers, elephants and enjoy traditional Tharu culture.

itinerary.title: Arrival and Tharu Culture
itinerary.description: Arrive in Chitwan and check into jungle resort. Tharu village tour. Evening Tharu cultural dance program.

itinerary.title: Jungle Safari Adventures
itinerary.description: Early morning jeep safari in core jungle area. Afternoon canoe ride on Rapti River followed by jungle walking safari.

itinerary.title: Elephant Activities and Nature Walk
itinerary.description: Morning visit to Elephant Breeding Center. Elephant safari through grasslands. Afternoon bird watching and nature walk.

itinerary.title: Final Safari and Departure
itinerary.description: Early morning final safari opportunity. Return for breakfast and checkout. Departure with unforgettable jungle memories.

title: Upper Mustang Flight & Drive Tour - 6 Days
description: Journey to the forbidden kingdom of Upper Mustang, a restricted area that preserves ancient Tibetan culture and traditions. Explore medieval cities, ancient monasteries, and dramatic desert landscapes.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Pokhara to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Morning flight to Pokhara, then scenic mountain flight to Jomsom. Explore Jomsom town and visit local monastery.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Charang to Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Drive through the Kali Gandaki valley to Charang. Visit the impressive Charang monastery with ancient murals.

itinerary.title: Explore Lo Manthang
itinerary.description: Full day exploring Lo Manthang's medieval architecture. Visit ancient gompas and meet with local Loba people.

itinerary.title: Lo Manthang to Ghar Gompa to Ghami
itinerary.description: Visit ancient Ghar Gompa and explore mysterious sky caves. Drive to Ghami village via different route.

itinerary.title: Ghami to Jomsom
itinerary.description: Return journey to Jomsom through scenic Mustang landscapes. Stop at Samar village and Chele.

itinerary.title: Jomsom to Pokhara to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight from Jomsom to Pokhara with spectacular mountain views. Connect to Kathmandu flight.

title: Kailash Mansarovar Yatra 12 Nights 13 Days
description: Embark on the sacred journey to Mount Kailash and Lake Mansarovar, one of the most revered pilgrimage sites in Hinduism, Buddhism, Jainism, and Bon religion. This 13-day overland journey from Kathmandu offers a transformative spiritual experience through the mystical landscapes of Tibet.
highlights: Holy bath and prayers at Lake Mansarovar
Spiritual journey through pristine Tibetan landscapes
Cultural immersion in Tibetan Buddhist traditions

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Arrival at Kathmandu International Airport, transfer to hotel, and yatra briefing session.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu Temple Visit
itinerary.description: Visit Pashupatinath Temple, Boudhanath Stupa, Jal Narayan Temple, and Kathmandu Durbar Square.

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Kodari
itinerary.description: Drive to Kodari (1600m) at the Nepal-Tibet border. Complete border formalities.

itinerary.title: Kodari to Nylam
itinerary.description: Cross into Tibet and drive to Nylam (2800m) for acclimatization.

itinerary.title: Nylam to Saga
itinerary.description: Drive to Saga (4500m) crossing the Brahmaputra River. Overnight at Saga.

itinerary.title: Saga to Mansarovar
itinerary.description: Drive to the sacred Lake Mansarovar (4550m). Check-in at Pramath Ashram.

itinerary.title: Mansarovar Parikrama to Darchen
itinerary.description: Complete Mansarovar Parikrama (102km), take holy bath, perform puja, then drive to Darchen.

itinerary.title: Darchen to Diraphuk
itinerary.description: Begin Kailash Parikrama. Trek from Darchen to Diraphuk (4860m, 12km) via Yamdwar.

itinerary.title: Diraphuk to Zutulphuk via Dolma La Pass
itinerary.description: Cross the challenging Dolma La Pass (5630m) and trek to Zutulphuk (4650m, 22km).

itinerary.title: Zutulphuk to Darchen to Saga
itinerary.description: Complete Kailash Parikrama by trekking back to Darchen (8km), then drive to Saga.

itinerary.title: Saga to Nylam
itinerary.description: Drive back to Nylam (2800m) retracing the route through Tibetan landscapes.

itinerary.title: Nylam to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Cross back into Nepal and drive to Kathmandu (1300m). Rest and relaxation.

itinerary.title: Departure from Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Transfer to airport for departure or extend stay in Kathmandu.

included: Gamow bag for altitude sickness prevention
First aid kit and medical support
excluded: Personal medical kit and Diamox tablets

title: Kailash Mansarovar Yatra 8 Nights 9 Days - Helicopter Route
description: Experience the sacred Kailash Mansarovar Yatra via helicopter route from Lucknow. This premium 9-day journey combines helicopter flights with the spiritual pilgrimage, offering comfort and convenience while maintaining the sacred essence of the yatra.
highlights: Helicopter flights from Simikot to Hilsa
Reduced travel time with helicopter transfers

itinerary.title: Arrival Lucknow - Drive to Nepalgunj
itinerary.description: Arrival at Lucknow Airport, meet and greet, drive to Nepalgunj (200km, 5-6 hours). Check-in at hotel. Yatra briefing before dinner.

itinerary.title: Nepalgunj - Fly to Simikot
itinerary.description: Morning flight to Simikot (45 minutes, 2800m). Transfer to hotel, evening visit to Lord Shiva Temple. Acclimatization day.

itinerary.title: Simikot - Helicopter to Hilsa - Drive to Purang
itinerary.description: Helicopter flight to Hilsa (20 minutes, 15kg baggage limit). Border formalities, drive to Purang (3700m, 35km, 1.5 hours). Check-in and rest.

itinerary.title: Acclimatization Day in Purang
itinerary.description: Rest day for acclimatization at 3900m. Light activities, medical check-up, preparation for higher altitudes.

itinerary.title: Purang - Mansarovar Lake
itinerary.description: Drive to Mansarovar Lake (102km, 4-5 hours, 4550m). Holy bath, prayers, and homa ceremony. Overnight at lake side.

itinerary.title: Mansarovar - Darchen - Trek to Deraphuk
itinerary.description: Drive to Darchen (58km, 2 hours, 4600m). Begin Kailash Parikrama, trek to Deraphuk (12km, 4860m). Overnight in guest house.

itinerary.title: Deraphuk - Dolma La Pass - Zutalphuk
itinerary.description: Cross Dolma La Pass (5630m), the highest point of Parikrama. Trek to Zutalphuk (22km, 4600m). Challenging but spiritually rewarding day.

itinerary.title: Zutalphuk - Darchen - Drive to Hilsa
itinerary.description: Complete Parikrama with trek to Darchen (8km, 3 hours). Drive to Hilsa (3700m). Border formalities and overnight.

itinerary.title: Hilsa - Helicopter to Simikot - Fly to Nepalgunj - Lucknow
itinerary.description: Helicopter to Simikot (20 minutes), flight to Nepalgunj (50 minutes), drive to Lucknow for departure.

included: First aid kit and medical support

title: Indo Nepal Cross Border Tour - 6 Nights 7 Days
description: Experience the best of Nepal with this comprehensive cross-border tour covering Pokhara's natural beauty, Kathmandu's cultural heritage, and Chitwan's wildlife adventure.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Gorakhpur - Lumbini - Pokhara
itinerary.description: Arrival in Gorakhpur, drive to Sunauli border, visit Lumbini (birthplace of Lord Buddha), continue to Pokhara

itinerary.title: Sarangkot Excursion & Pokhara Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Early morning sunrise at Sarangkot, Pokhara city tour including Bindavasini Temple, David Falls, Gupteshwor Cave, boat ride on Phewa Lake

itinerary.title: Pokhara to Kathmandu via Manakamana
itinerary.description: Scenic drive to Kathmandu with cable car visit to Manakamana Temple

itinerary.title: Kathmandu City Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Pashupatinath Temple, Jala Narayan Temple, Swayambhunath Stupa, Boudhanath Stupa, and Kathmandu Durbar Square

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Chitwan
itinerary.description: Drive to Chitwan, visit Tharu Village, evening Tharu stick dance performance

itinerary.title: Chitwan Safari Activities
itinerary.description: Canoe trip, Elephant Breeding Center, jungle walk, elephant or jeep safari in Chitwan National Park

itinerary.title: Chitwan to Gorakhpur Departure
itinerary.description: Drive back to Gorakhpur for departure

title: Nepal Golden Triangle Tour - 7 Nights 8 Days
description: Discover Nepal's most popular destinations in this comprehensive golden triangle tour covering Kathmandu's heritage, Pokhara's natural beauty, and Chitwan's wildlife.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Airport pickup, hotel check-in, evening aarti at Pashupatinath Temple

itinerary.title: Kathmandu City Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Jala Narayan Temple, Swayambhunath, Kathmandu Durbar Square, and Boudhanath Stupa

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Pokhara via Manakamana
itinerary.description: Drive to Pokhara with cable car visit to Manakamana Temple, evening at Lakeside

itinerary.title: Sarangkot Excursion & Pokhara Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Sunrise at Sarangkot, Bindabasini Temple, David Falls, Gupteshwor Cave, Phewa Lake boating

itinerary.title: Pokhara to Chitwan
itinerary.description: Drive to Chitwan, visit Tharu Village, evening Tharu stick dance

itinerary.title: Chitwan Safari Activities
itinerary.description: Canoe ride, Elephant Breeding Center, jungle walk, elephant or jeep safari

itinerary.title: Chitwan to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Drive back to Kathmandu, free time for shopping at Thamel

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Airport transfer for final departure

title: Everest Base Camp Trek - 13 Nights 14 Days
description: Experience the ultimate adventure with this classic Everest Base Camp trek. Walk in the footsteps of legendary climbers and witness the world's highest peak up close.
highlights: Flight to Lukla - world's most dangerous airport

itinerary.title: Arrive in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Airport pickup, hotel check-in, trek briefing

itinerary.title: Fly to Lukla, trek to Phakding
itinerary.description: Spectacular mountain flight to Lukla, trek to Phakding (2,610m)

itinerary.title: Trek to Namche Bazaar
itinerary.description: Enter Sagarmatha National Park, trek to Namche Bazaar (3,440m)

itinerary.title: Acclimatization day at Namche
itinerary.description: Rest day, visit Khunde and Khumjung villages, mountain views

itinerary.title: Trek to Tengboche
itinerary.description: Trek to Tengboche (3,850m), visit famous monastery

itinerary.title: Trek to Dingboche
itinerary.description: Trek to Dingboche (4,350m) via Pangboche village

itinerary.title: Acclimatization day at Dingboche
itinerary.description: Rest day, optional hike to Chhukung

itinerary.title: Trek to Lobuche
itinerary.description: Trek to Lobuche (4,950m), memorial cairns

itinerary.title: Trek to Everest Base Camp and Gorakshep
itinerary.description: Trek to Everest Base Camp (5,364m), return to Gorakshep (5,160m)

itinerary.title: Hike to Kala Patthar, trek to Pheriche
itinerary.description: Early morning hike to Kala Patthar (5,545m), trek down to Pheriche (4,240m)

itinerary.title: Trek to Namche Bazaar
itinerary.description: Descend to Namche Bazaar through rhododendron forests

itinerary.title: Trek to Lukla
itinerary.description: Final trekking day, return to Lukla

itinerary.title: Fly back to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Morning flight to Kathmandu, free time for shopping

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Airport transfer for final departure

title: Muktinath Yatra - 6 Nights 7 Days
description: Sacred pilgrimage to Muktinath Temple, the place of salvation. This spiritual journey combines religious significance with stunning Himalayan landscapes.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Airport pickup, hotel check-in, evening aarti at Pashupatinath Temple

itinerary.title: Kathmandu to Pokhara via Manakamana
itinerary.description: Drive to Pokhara with cable car visit to Manakamana Temple

itinerary.title: Fly to Jomsom, drive to Muktinath
itinerary.description: Morning flight to Jomsom, drive to Muktinath Temple for darshan, return to Jomsom

itinerary.title: Fly to Pokhara, city sightseeing
itinerary.description: Flight back to Pokhara, city tour including Bindavasini Temple, David Falls, Phewa Lake boating

itinerary.title: Pokhara to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Drive back to Kathmandu, evening shopping at Thamel

itinerary.title: Kathmandu City Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Boudhanath Stupa, Swayambhunath, Jala Narayan Temple, Kathmandu Durbar Square

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Airport transfer for final departure

title: Nepal Heritage Tour - 3 Nights 4 Days
description: Explore Nepal's rich cultural heritage in this short but comprehensive tour covering Kathmandu Valley's UNESCO World Heritage sites.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Airport pickup, hotel check-in, welcome dinner

itinerary.title: Kathmandu Valley Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit Kathmandu Durbar Square, Swayambhunath, Pashupatinath Temple

itinerary.title: Patan and Bhaktapur Tour
itinerary.description: Explore Patan Durbar Square and Bhaktapur Durbar Square, traditional crafts

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Last-minute shopping, airport transfer

title: Nepal Tour - 4 Nights 5 Days by Flight
description: Perfect introduction to Nepal combining cultural heritage of Kathmandu with the natural beauty of Pokhara, optimized for travelers with limited time.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Airport pickup, hotel check-in, orientation tour

itinerary.title: Kathmandu Sightseeing
itinerary.description: Visit major UNESCO sites including Durbar Square, Pashupatinath, Boudhanath

itinerary.title: Fly to Pokhara
itinerary.description: Morning flight to Pokhara, city tour, Phewa Lake activities

itinerary.title: Pokhara Exploration
itinerary.description: Sarangkot sunrise, waterfalls, caves, and mountain viewpoints

itinerary.title: Return to Kathmandu and Departure
itinerary.description: Flight back to Kathmandu, airport transfer

title: Annapurna Base Camp Trek - 13 Nights 14 Days
description: Trek to the heart of the Annapurna Sanctuary, surrounded by towering peaks. Experience diverse landscapes from subtropical forests to alpine meadows.

itinerary.title: Arrive in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Airport pickup, hotel check-in, trek preparation

itinerary.title: Drive to Pokhara
itinerary.description: Scenic drive to Pokhara, trek briefing

itinerary.title: Drive to Nayapul, trek to Tikhedhunga
itinerary.description: Drive to Nayapul, start trekking to Tikhedhunga

itinerary.title: Trek to Ghorepani
itinerary.description: Climb to Ghorepani through rhododendron forests

itinerary.title: Poon Hill sunrise, trek to Tadapani
itinerary.description: Early morning hike to Poon Hill, trek to Tadapani

itinerary.title: Trek to Chhomrong
itinerary.description: Descend to Modi Khola, climb to Chhomrong village

itinerary.title: Trek to Bamboo
itinerary.description: Descend to Chhomrong Khola, trek through bamboo forests

itinerary.title: Trek to Deurali
itinerary.description: Trek through the Modi Khola valley to Deurali

itinerary.title: Trek to Annapurna Base Camp
itinerary.description: Enter Annapurna Sanctuary, reach Base Camp

itinerary.title: Explore ABC, trek to Bamboo
itinerary.description: Sunrise at ABC, descend to Bamboo

itinerary.title: Trek to Jhinu Danda
itinerary.description: Trek to Jhinu Danda, relax in hot springs

itinerary.title: Trek to Nayapul, drive to Pokhara
itinerary.description: Final trekking day, drive back to Pokhara

itinerary.title: Drive to Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Return to Kathmandu, celebration dinner

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: Airport transfer for final departure
